fields.title: FAQ's
fields.content:
Frequently asked Questions (FAQ)

How is iBidGames different from other auction websites?

Unlike other auction websites, iBidGames allows you to win top of the line products for a fraction of their retail price. We also have an interactive chat feature that will make bidding ten times more exciting than other sites.

How does iBidGames make money?

We make our revenue strictly from the amount of credits we sell. Remember, credits are needed in order for you to win an item.

What does auction timer mean?

The auction timer is the clock that resets every time a new bid is placed on an item. Remember, the auction time for each item is predetermined by the auctioneer. As the competition on an item increases, the predetermined time for that item is decreased to give you a better chance of winning.

How long does the auction last?

The auction duration is strictly determined by the bidders (YOU). The goal is to be the last bidder when the timer hits zero.

How much does it cost to bid?

bids has different prices, you can see it when you add bids to an auction

How can I get free credits?

You can get free bids by initially registering, inviting friends, sending video testimonials of your winnings to us, and by buying bid packages with bonus bids.

How many auctions can I bid on?

You may participate in all auctions you want.

What's the maximum I can bid?

You can bid as many times as you want but can only increase the bid by One cent.

How does auction price of an item increase?

The price increases in increments of a penny every time a bid is placed.

Can I withdraw my bids?

No. Once a bid is placed it is final.

Can I cash out my credits?

No. All credits purchased are non-transferable and non-refundable and may only be used by bidding on the iBidGames marketplace. The winning bidder pays the final auction closing price.

How much is shipping?

Your shipping is free! iBidGames will be handling your shipping charges.

How do I get my product?

Your product is shipped directly from Amazon.com

How long do I have to pay for the auction?

You have 72 hours to complete payment from the time the auction is closed. If payment is not received, iBidGames reserves the right to list the item without prior notice.

What kind of warranty comes with the products purchased?

Most items come with a standard manufacturer warranty. Please log-on the manufacturer's site directly for any warranty related questions on your items.

What is your return policy?

All sales are FINAL. iBidGames will gladly exchange any defective item if a claim is made within 7 days from the time the item is received.

Can I cancel my purchase?

When winning an item, you have agreed to purchase it. No cancellations.

How can you be reached?

You can reach us via email: (info@ibidgames.com)

fields.title: Terms And Conditions
fields.content:
Terms And Conditions

1. Overview

The following General Terms and Conditions shall apply exclusively to the business relationship between Interactive Bid Games Inc. (ibidgames), its internet platform www.ibidgames.com ("ibidgames") and our users. By using ibidgames, the user accepts the following Terms and Conditions, as well as the manner in which ibidgames and the “Auctioneers” operate as described on the website www.ibidgames.com. Variations or alterations in the following Terms and Conditions shall only be binding upon ibidgames, LLC if agreed to in writing.

2. Eligibility to Participate/Registration with “ibidgames”/Disqualification

By placing a bid on ibidgames, the user declares that they are legally capable of entering into binding contracts and that they are at least 18 years old.

Employees and relatives of employees of ibidgames are not eligible to participate in ibidgames auctions under any circumstances, but to ensure the normal functionallity of the plataform and can't win or keep any prizes whatsover.

ibidgames’s products and services are offered exclusively to private users and not to commercial or partly-commercial resellers. ibidgames reserves the right to exclude commercial resellers from the participation in the auctions and to close their user accounts at any time. Each user may register only once using their postal address (registration using PO Boxes or equivalents is not permitted). Additionally, up to three users registration per household is permitted. During the registration process, the user must choose a username. The username must not be offensive, be selected to deceive or mis-inform other users, may not offend common decency or infringe upon the rights of third parties. If ibidgames receives information of a username which is illegal or in breach of these Terms, this username can be amended by ibidgames without prior notice. The corresponding user password is to be kept secret by the user. User accounts created during registration are non-transferable. The user account may be used only by the user and not by anyone else. Any abuse of the user account, be it to the detriment of third parties or to the detriment of ibidgames, shall result in the disqualification of the user and the reporting of a crime. In general, the user shall be liable for all activities that are undertaken using the user account together with the associated password.

ibidgames reserves the right to temporarily or permanently disqualify a user, or disable their account at any time, and at its sole discretion. Users will be disqualified when in the reasonable opinion of ibidgames member has violated any laws or the rights of third parties. A user will be disqualified if such action will protect the rights of other users, or to prevent unauthorized manipulation or use of ibidgames. Examples of such unauthorized usage include (but are not limited to) non-payment of bids, use of unauthorized third-party bidding software or set up of multiple user accounts by the same individual. In case of a breach of these Terms, ibidgames reserves the right to withhold deliveries or refunds for bids.

Furthermore, ibidgames reserves the right to limit the number of auctions a user may win or the number of his successfully finished auctions at its sole discretion. Please refer to our separate acceptable use policy for additional information.

4. Bidding

Bids can be placed by clicking on the relevant bid buttons. The Auctioneer is a ibidgames team member who assists bidders if they have any questions. To ask an Auctioneer a question about bidding, you must communicate through our built in chat feature. The user can read about how the Auctioneer operates in the “How It Works” section. The user is prohibited from using bidding software not authorized by ibidgames, and doing so will result in immediate disqualification from use (see clause 2: Eligibility and the Acceptable Use Policy).

5. How the Auctions Work

With each bid placed, the price of the item on which the user is bidding increases by the amount specified (one penny). A bid submitted by the user constitutes willingness of a user to enter into a binding contract with ibidgames and in the event of a successful finishing of an auction, the claim to win the virtual item of the auction under the conditions set out in the related auction.

10. Disclaimer of Warranty and Limitation of Liability regarding the Use of ibidgames.

USER EXPRESSLY AGREES THAT USE OF IBIDGAMES INTERACTIVE IS AT USER'S SOLE RISK. NEITHER IBIDGAMES, ITS AFFILIATES NOR ANY OF THEIR RESPECTIVE EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, THIRD PARTY CONTENT PROVIDERS OR LICENSORS WARRANT THAT IBIDGAMES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR FREE; NOR DO THEY MAKE ANY WARRANTY AS TO THE RESULTS THAT MAY BE OBTAINED FROM USE OF IBIDGAMES, OR AS TO THE ACCURACY, RELIABILITY OR CONTENT OF ANY INFORMATION, SERVICE, OR MERCHANDISE PROVIDED THROUGH IBIDGAMES.

IBIDGAMES IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" BASIS; TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, IBIDGAMES DISCLAIMS ALL REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO ANY INFORMATION, SERVICES, PRODUCTS AND MATERIALS, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, FREEDOM FROM COMPUTER VIRUS AND IMPLIED WARRANTIES ARISING FROM COURSE OF DEALING OR COURSE OF PERFORMANCE. IN ADDITION, IBIDGAMES DOES NOT REPRESENT OR WARRANT THAT THE INFORMATION ACCESSIBLE VIA THE SITE IS ACCURATE, COMPLETE OR CURRENT. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS.

THIS DISCLAIMER OF LIABILITY APPLIES TO ANY DAMAGES OR INJURY CAUSED BY ANY FAILURE OF PERFORMANCE, ERROR, OMISSION, INTERRUPTION, DELETION, DEFECT, DELAY IN OPERATION OR TRANSMISSION, COMPUTER VIRUS, COMMUNICATION LINE FAILURE, THEFT OR DESTRUCTION OR UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO, ALTERATION OF, OR USE OF RECORD, WHETHER FOR BREACH OF CONTRACT, TORTIOUS BEHAVIOR, NEGLIGENCE, OR UNDER ANY OTHER CAUSE OF ACTION. USER SPECIFICALLY ACKNOWLEDGES THAT IBIDGAMES IS NOT LIABLE FOR THE DEFAMATORY, OFFENSIVE OR ILLEGAL CONDUCT OF OTHER USERS OR THIRD-PARTIES AND THAT THE RISK OF INJURY FROM THE FOREGOING RESTS ENTIRELY WITH USER.

IN NO EVENT WILL IBIDGAMES, OR ANY PERSON OR ENTITY INVOLVED IN USE OF A IBIDGAMES AUCTION, BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF THE USE OF OR INABILITY TO USE IBIDGAMES. USER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES THAT THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION SHALL APPLY TO ALL CONTENT ON IBIDGAMES.

IN ADDITION TO THE TERMS SET FORTH ABOVE NEITHER, IBIDGAMES, NOR ITS AFFILIATES, INFORMATION PROVIDERS OR CONTENT PARTNERS SHALL BE LIABLE REGARDLESS OF THE CAUSE OR DURATION, FOR ANY ERRORS, INACCURACIES, OMISSIONS, OR OTHER DEFECTS IN, OR UNTIMELINESS OR UNAUTHENTICITY OF, THE INFORMATION CONTAINED IBIDGAMES, OR FOR ANY DELAY OR INTERRUPTION IN THE TRANSMISSION THEREOF TO THE USER, OR FOR ANY CLAIMS OR LOSSES ARISING THEREFROM OR OCCASIONED THEREBY. NONE OF THE FOREGOING PARTIES SHALL BE LIABLE FOR ANY THIRD-PARTY CLAIMS OR LOSSES OF ANY NATURE, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, LOST PROFITS, PUNITIVE OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES. NEITHER, IBIDGAMES, NOR ITS AFFILIATES, INFORMATION PROVIDERS OR CONTENT PARTNERS WARRANT OR GUARANTEE THE TIMELINESS, SEQUENCE, ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF THIS INFORMATION. ADDITIONALLY, THERE ARE NO WARRANTIES AS TO THE RESULTS OBTAINED FROM THE USE OF THE INFORMATION.

EXCEPT FOR THE WARRANTIES SET FORTH ABOVE IBIDGAMES MAKES NO OTHER WARRANTIES, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, WITH RESPECT TO THE PRODUCTS, OR ANY RELATED SERVICES PERFORMED BY IBIDGAMES OR ANY OF ITS AGENTS OR SUBCONTRACTORS IN CONNECTION WITH ANY ORDER, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, ANY WARRANTIES OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, WHICH OTHER WARRANTIES ARE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED AND DISCLAIMED. IBIDGAMES SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR PERSONAL INJURY AND PROPERTY DAMAGE RESULTING FROM THE IMPROPER HANDLING, MODIFICATION, MISUSE OF THE PRODUCTS BY THE CUSTOMER OR ANY OTHER PERSON FOLLOWING DELIVERY BY IBIDGAMES. IN NO EVENT SHALL IBIDGAMES BE LIABLE TO ANY PERSON FOR INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO LOSS OF PROFITS OR GOODWILL, LOSS-OF-USE DAMAGES OR ADDITIONAL EXPENSES INCURRED, WHETHER PURSUANT TO A CLAIM IN CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE AND WHETHER IN AN ACTION FOR BREACH OF WARRANTY OR OTHERWISE.

12. System Outage / Temporarily Halted Auctions

A system outage has occurred if no bids can be submitted for items due to an unforeseeable disruption in a system. In such a case, auctions will be temporarily halted and the remaining times for the auctions, the current bidding price and the current highest bidder will be maintained. After the disruption has been resolved, the auctions will be continued and 10 minutes will be added to the remaining times for the auctions. Temporarily halted auctions are clearly indicated. Bids placed on a temporarily halted auction shall not be credited back on a user’s account and are not eligible for a refund for bids used or other costs incurred.

With the currently available technology, it is not possible to develop and operate computer programs (software) and data processing systems (hardware) completely without errors, or to rule out any unpredictable events in connection with the internet (hereinafter referred to collectively as “technical faults”). ibidgames, therefore, provides no guarantee for the constant and uninterrupted availability of its website and technical systems. In addition, but not subject to, the provisions of clause number 10, ibidgames shall not be liable for any damage whatsoever incurred by auction users or third parties from using ibidgames’s services. In particular, ibidgames shall not be liable for damage that occurs due to bids submitted by auction users not being received by ibidgames or not being received promptly or not being considered, as a consequence of technical faults.

13. Trademarks

ibidgames's logos are trademarks of Interactive Bid Games Inc. or any of its subsidiaries. All rights reserved. All other trademarks appearing on ibidgames are the property of their respective owners.

15. Applicable Law / Severability Clause

This Terms of Use Agreement and your use of the website shall be governed by the laws of the United States of America and the State of California without regard to its conflicts of laws principles. Any legal action or proceeding related to this website shall be brought exclusively in a federal or state court of competent jurisdiction sitting in California.

16. Protection of Data

Collection, Processing, and Use of our Customers’ Personal Information The protection of your data is very important to us.

For more information on the collection, processing, and use of personal data, please read our Privacy Policy.

17. General

The contract between ibidgames and users is binding on the parties and on their respective successors and assigns. The user may not transfer, assign, charge or otherwise dispose of any contract formed under these General Terms and Conditions or any of their rights or obligations without ibidgames’s prior written consent.

ibidgames has the right to revise and amend these General Terms and Conditions from time to time in its absolute discretion but for reasons including but not limited to changes in market conditions affecting ibidgames’s business, changes in technology, changes in payment methods, changes in relevant laws and regulatory requirements and changes in ibidgames’s system capabilities. All users will be subject to the policies and terms and conditions in force at the time that they have successfully bid for items listed on the ibidgames website, unless any change to such policies or terms and conditions is required to be made by law or governmental authority or ibidgames notifies its users of the changes to such policies or General Terms and Conditions before ibidgames sends information relating to dispatch (in which case ibidgames has the right to assume that all successful winners have accepted the changes to the terms and conditions unless notified to the contrary with 7 working days by the user of the items).

ibidgames is the owner or licensee of all intellectual property rights on the ibidgames website and the material published on it. Those works are protected by copyright laws and treaties around the world and all rights relating to the same are reserved. Users may print one copy and may download extracts of pages for personal reference only. Users may not modify any paper or digital copies of any materials printed or downloaded. Users must also not use any illustrations, photographs, video or audio sequences or any graphics separately from any accompanying text. Users must not use any part of the materials on the ibidgames website for commercial purposes.

This Agreement and any operating rules for ibidgames established by ibidgames constitute the entire agreement of the parties with respect to the subject matter hereof, and supersede all previous written or oral agreements between the parties with respect to such subject matter. This Agreement shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California, without regard to its conflict of laws rules. No waiver by either party of any breach or default hereunder shall be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach or default. The section headings used herein are for convenience only and shall not be given any legal import.

fields.title: Privacy Policy
fields.content:
Privacy
iBidGames.com respects the privacy of its users, and other individuals and businesses using ibidgames.com and Interactive Bid Games Inc.(IBG) applications. This Privacy Policy, effective January 1st, 2013, is to keep you informed about the types of information collected on IBG Sites and how the information is used and protected.

USE OF COOKIES

IBG Sites may use "cookies" to collect anonymous information. Cookies are bits of encrypted data that are loaded by IBG's server onto your computer when you visit an IBG Site. The server can retrieve the cookies the next time you visit a site and use them to identify the computer as a return visitor. ibidgames.com uses cookies to collect non-personally identifiable information and generically track usage patterns on the IBG Sites in order to monitor activity and administer the sites. ibidgames.com also uses information obtained from cookies to improve IBG Sites, and make decisions concerning advertising, product offerings and services. Most users can disable cookies from their Internet browsers, receive a warning before a cookie is placed on their computer, and erase all cookies from their computer hard drives by following the instructions provided by the browser.

DISCLOSURE TO THIRD PARTIES

We will make your personally identifiable information available to other companies or people when: You have elected to allow us to share that information at the time that you registered with us or provided us the information through our website. We hire third-party vendors to provide specialized services such as customer support; email message deployment; suppression, merge and de-duplication services; data processing; and special products or services that you have requested. These companies are only allowed to use the information in order to help us fulfill our services to you. We do not provide your information to these companies for their own, permanent use. You unsubscribe for a mailing that we send to you on behalf of a third party. We may share your removal instruction with the third party so that it may be added to that person’s list of people to whom they may not send emails. When required by law, such as when we respond to subpoenas court orders, or legal process. We believe that your actions violate applicable laws, ibidgames Terms of Use, or any usage guidelines for specific products or services, or threaten the rights, property, or safety of our company, our users, or others. In the event it is required in connection with the sale, lease or transfer of all or a portion of ibidgames.com' assets.

E-MAIL COMMUNICATIONS

ibidgames.com may use e-mail to communicate with you, respond to your e-mail, and to tell you about new products and services. If you do not wish to receive e-mail promotions and new products and service announcements from ibidgames.com, please follow the instructions that appear at the end of the e-mail communication that you receive from ibidgames.com to have your name removed from the list.

SECURITY

ibidgames.com utilizes several encryption methods to ensure that the data you submit on any of the IBG Sites is secure. Through this "secure session," information that you input into a ibidgames.com online order form will be sent and will arrive privately and unaltered at an IBG server. This security prohibits access to your information by other companies and Web users.

CHILDREN

ibidgames.com does not intend to collect personally identifiable information from individuals under 18 years of age. If ibidgames.com becomes aware that a user who is under 18 is using an IBG Site, ibidgames.com will specifically instruct that individual that they are not to submit information on IBG Sites without a parent or guardian's consent. If a child has provided ibidgames.com with personally identifiable information without ibidgames.com' knowledge, a parent or guardian of the child may contact ibidgames.com at info@ibidgames.com and ibidgames.com will delete the child's information from our existing files.

LINKS

Some IBG Sites contain links to other Web sites that are owned and operated by parties other than ibidgames.com. Please be aware that this Privacy Policy does not extend to any Web sites other than those owned and controlled by ibidgames.com.

ACCOUNT INFORMATION

You may always contact us at info@ibidgames.com to verify your name, address, e-mail address, telephone number and/or billing information. ibidgames.com will correct any information that is inaccurate.

QUESTIONS

If you have questions or comments regarding this Privacy Policy, you may contact us at info@ibidgames.com. If you have submitted personally identifiable information, and would like that information deleted from our records, please contact us at our e-mail address, info@ibidgames.com. We will use reasonable efforts to delete that information from our files.

UPDATES

ibidgames.com may amend this Privacy Policy from time-to-time. These changes will be posted online.

fields.title: Invite a Friend and Get Free Bids!
How it works?
fields.content:
Video Tutorial
Schema of the Auction
Here is How it Works

1. First, you register.
2. After registering, you confirm your email and acquire your 5 free bids.
3. Now you may begin bidding.
4. To win, you must place the last bid.

The auction starts after the first bid is placed on an item. Each time a new bid is placed, the resets to a predetermined time. When the timer hits zero and you are the last bidder, you win!

The purpose of Yambid.com is to provide entertainment and great bargains. Yambid.com holds the right to refuse service/bidding rights to anyone. The following are regulations that need to be followed in order to maintain an enjoyable and inviting online bidding experience for everyone.

Chat Regulations

1. No Foul language please.
2. No discussions of member investments.
3. No promoting other sites.
4. Rude behavior will NOT BE PERMITTED.
5. And the most important rule of all. HAVE FUN!
